name: Wigwam Merino Comfort Hiker Socks 2-Pack - Children to Youths
description: These incredibly comfortable, well-fitting kids' socks are made of soft, non-itchy, merino that holds its shape through wash after wash. What more could you ask for in kids' socks?Soft merino wool, nylon, polyester, Tencel and spandex wicks moisture and dries quickly.Fully cushioned with elasticized arch panel.Seamless toe closure contruction ensures chafe-free comfort.Package of 2 pairs.
